alert.note: Alert for City of Suffolk; Greensville; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:47PM EDT until August 07 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT FOR BERTIE...NORTHAMPTON...HERTFORD...WESTERN GATES...SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE...AND SOUTHWESTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 847 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Littleton to near Halifax to near Tarboro, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Garysburg, Rich Square, Woodland, and Roxobel around 900 PM EDT. Conway, Seaboard, and Lewiston Woodville around 905 PM EDT. Murfreesboro, Aulander, and Chowan University around 910 PM EDT. Ahoskie around 915 PM EDT. Windsor, Boykins, Winton, Powellsville, and Como around 920 PM EDT. Suffolk and Cofield around 925 PM EDT. Newsoms, Harrellsville, and Roduco around 930 PM EDT. Gatesville, Gates, and Colerain around 935 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Goose Pond, Eagletown, Milwaukee, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Kelford, Earleys, Gum Forks, Menola, and Newsome Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
